content: Research Drift SDK delegation APIs and compute budget best practices via web search

Create FastAPI stub with /api/engine/kill and /api/engine/ping endpoints
Wire environment variables (HELIUS_API_KEY, RPC_URL, DRIFT_ENV=devnet, etc.)
Test delegation flow on devnet: setDelegate, place order, confirm, revoke
Create minimal UI shell: TopBar (Connect/DelegationBadge/EmergencyStop), StrategyControls panel, ActivityLog table
Apply design tokens from design_guidelines.md to frontend (CSS variables, fonts, colors)
Test POC + UI shell integration and call testing_agent for validation
